ack.title: Declaration of interests
ack.p: RVB reports grants from The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, National Institutes of Health (NIH), Royalty Research Fund (University of Washington), and King K Holmes Professorship in STDs and AIDS, during the conduct of the study. JMB reports grants from the Gates Foundation during the conduct of the study; grants from the Gates Foundation, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, NIH, and United States Agency for International Development; and personal fees from Gilead Sciences, Merck, and Janssen, outside the submitted work. CC reports grants from the Gates Foundation, during the conduct of the study; personal fees from Gilead Sciences and Merck, outside the submitted work. AES reports grants from The Gates Foundation, NIH, and University of Washington Royalty Research Foundation, during the conduct of the study. PE is an employee of the funder. All other authors declare no competing interests.
